definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: The online communication of Hu Jintao's secretary-general showed this racily .
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛总书记的在线交流生动地说明了这一点。

definition: Xi Jinping (1953-), PRC politician, General Secretary of the CCP from 2012, president of the PRC from 2013
Liu Yunshan (1947-), PRC politician, background in journalism in Inner Mongolia, head of the Central Propaganda Department 2002-2012
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
Jiang Zemin (1926-), politician, president of PRC 1993-2003
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)
Hua Guofeng (1921-2008), leader of Chinese Communist Party after the Cultural Revolution
Zhao Leji (1957-), member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection
